attributes.action: Stop all the illegal crossings into England
attributes.additional_details: By allowing criminals into England, you are allowing the potential of deadlier viruses entering England from the EU and terrorists at a cost so far over £500 million pounds whereas this money could be used to help those in need in our country.
attributes.background: Stop all the illegals crossing the English channel into England and send all those here back to where they came from.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/601969
